EmailTemplate.description: Email Template for Work.com Return to Work Employee Wellness Survey
EmailTemplate.name: Return to Work Wellness Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Wellness Survey - Please Complete
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We're thankful to start the process of returning to the workplace. To help us do so safely and responsibly, please respond to this survey, which assesses your current health.
Your responses are used only to determine whether you're ready to return to your workplace. If you decline to provide health data, you must continue working remotely. To decline, please take the survey and indicate that choice.
The survey link is unique to you. Don't forward this email to others.
{{Survey}}
Thank you, and we appreciate your support and cooperation.
